data.actual_result: ESC button jumps out of place until you exit and re-enter the settings page.
data.short_description: ESC button jumps out of its original place when the Unsaved Changes causes the screen to shake due to attempting to exit the page while it is present
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Channel Settings or Server Settings and make a permission change to a role - Attempt to exit out of the page or enter another. Note: Don't use ESC to exit the page, as there's a bug not yet fixed that causes it to exit through the Unsaved Changes message.
